review: Dr Deepak was very friendly *** ********* ************** Explained everything in details. The cavity filling was carried out very professionally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review:
I've recently undergone Root Canal Treatment with wisdom tooth extraction with crowning pending.
If I have to highlight one major aspect, it will be - painless treatment. 
Both the RCT procedure (perfomed by Dr. Deepak) and wisdom tooth extraction (performed by other dental surgeon) went very smooth.
I was relaxed when Dr. Deepak was working on my teeth. You will feel that he will take care of the problem. 
The whole team (doctors, nurses, reception team) is cordial and professional.
I will recommend this clinic to anyone with dental problems.

tags: Value for money,
review:
During my recent visit to the clinic regarding concerns about my wisdom tooth, I had the opportunity to meet with both Doctor Roy and Doctor Deepak. They thoroughly examined my condition and provided valuable insights on the measures that could be taken. Overall, the experience was satisfactory, with one exception.

The aspect that I found disappointing was the discussion about the cost of the extraction procedure. Initially, Doctor Roy informed me that if I opted for a specialized dentist, the charge would be 6000/-. However, if I chose to have the extraction performed by the in-house doctors, the cost would be 3500/-. This seemed like a reasonable difference in price.

To my surprise, when Doctor Deepak joined the conversation, he contradicted Doctor Roy's statement. He informed me that if I decided to have a specialized dentist perform the extraction, the cost would be 6000/-. On the other hand, if I chose to have the in-house doctors carry out the procedure, the cost would be 5000/-. This ************* ** *********** made me question the transparency and reliability of the clinic's team.

As a result, my interest in further consultation with the clinic diminished. I decided to seek a second opinion *** ********** **** ** ****** ***** * ******** *** ********* ************ *** *** ** ****** ***** ********** ************** *********** ***** ** ***** ** *** ****** ********* ****** ********** *** ************ *********** ******** ** *** ******* ********* *** **** ** *** ********** ********* **** ** **** * ***** ** ********* ** ** ********* *** ******* ************* ** ******** ************ *** ****** **** ******** *** ************* ***** *** ******* ** ***** **********

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Both the dentist and assistant advised to get wisdom tooth removed ****** **** ******* ** ******** ** ******** ********** *** **** ********* ********The assistant miraculously saw cavity in my wisdom tooth about to hit my nerve. But when i asked the doctor, he said he was not sure about the cavity being present from the x-ray. But, still he insisted we go for the tooth removal.
After checking with the doctor multiple times, he reassured the process will be very simple and i should feel only some minor pain the next day.
However, it turned out to be exactly the opposite. *** ***** ********** **** * **** ******* ******** **** ***** ****** ** *** ***** Also the day after the removal when we called the doctor to check for my fever, he confidently denied the tooth removal to have any role in the fever !
Last but not the least : Had to pay additional 300 for x-ray even after paying the full amount for tooth removal.
* ********** ***** ** *** **** ********** *** *** ***** ****** *** ** ****** *** ** ** *** ******* ** *** ***** ****** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** ****** * ** *********. I was suffering with sever TMJ issue. Deepak Sir helped me to come out of the pain. I was so depressed because of pain and sever headaches couldn't even concentrate on my work. I have visited 
multiple places but didn't get required treatment. Sir gave enough support and told me to trust him that he will help me resolve this issue. As sir  said with his awesome treatment I got my TMJ issue resolved. I am grateful that my brother found Deepak Sir.  

No second thought required any dental issue 1000% I recommend Deepak Sir.

Thanks a lot sir for your help

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have braces and developed sensitive pain in my right molars. I was recommended by a relative to see doctor Deepak and I am glad I did. Because of braces and no regular scaling I had swollen gums and tar which Doc Deepak and Deepthi made sure get cleaned to the level they could and my molars were desensitised by Doc Deepak which gave me the strength to pull up again after 3 days of really bad toothache. I recommend to see Doc Deepak as he is good with the process and keeps his patients informed about the procedure. However scared I was I am grateful I went for the treatment to Dr Deepak and team.
reply_text: Thanks Priyanka for your kind words of appreciation. This will motivate us to keep working , keep improving our self and to provide the best possible treatment for our patients. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** **** ***** **** *** **** ****** **** * **** ******. I had extreme sensitivity and gaps in my teeth. Doctor Deepak explained the causes and the solutions well. He is friendly and does excatly what is needed. No extra procedures or misguiding like other doctors you'll find in most clinic..I have been going for regular checkups and treatments from 2 years now and completely happy with the treatment. I'm so thankful that in Bangalore I could find such a good clinic.. everyone at the clinic is friendly and helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: It was a very good experience. In the first visit he patiently explained the complete procedure with a detailed break up of the amount that will be spent. The best part that I liked was that he looked at the status of my infection and immediately went ahead with cleaning and removal even in the weekend. Generally he avoids to do surgery in the weekends. He takes special care for each patient. I would strongly recommend to get treated from him. Take a prior appointment as he has long list of patients and be punctual.
Dr Deepak was very friendly *** ********* ************** Explained everything in details. The cavity filling was carried out very professionally.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: An amazing doctor !!Lives up to his high practo ratings!!! I had to get two of my teeth, one lower wisdom and one upper, extracted.My previous dentist wasn't able to as I'm extra sensitive to pain ans wasn't able to sit for extraction ao she had to let me go. This had happened twice!!So I thought of going to another Dentist, and TBH I was skeptical of successful outcome.But Dr. Daryani called an expert and I'm surprised how pain less extraction of two teeth were, as he had said it would be!Would strongly recommend,  even if uou are extra sensitive to pain!

Dr. Deepak is very professional and explains the issue very clearly. My mother had lot of teeth issue and we need to take multiple appointments for RCT, filling, crowns and bridges. Staffs are also very friendly and courteous. On time appointment and highly recommended.

I saw other reviews which mentioned he is costly but he is a little too costly. To make a comparison i have never given more than 1.5k for cleaning (i get it done regularly) and he was charging 5k. I understand the equipment might be slightly better but 300% more fees. 

He also asked 12k for one extraction which i found outrageous. Nobody has asked me 5-6k per tooth. ** **** ******* * *** ********* **** ** ****** ************ **** * ****** *** *** *** *** ********* **** *** ** ****** ** **. * *** **** ** *** **** ************ ** **** ********** *** ********* *** ****** ****** ** ** ********** ** * ****** *****

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
It was our first visit to the clinic and I was very happy to see  doctor friendly behaviour, doctor explained each and every thing in details with available options to choose.

I highly recommend others to visit at least once to experience the service.
reply_text: Thanks so much for your kind words of appreciation. We at HSR Dental Clinic & Implant Centre are striving to achieve excellence in every dental procedure we do. Your encouragement will motivate us to keep working hard towards giving the best to all our patients. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: When I first came to the clinic with my TJ issue, I was completely clueless about what's causing the pain and discomfort. When i met Dr Deepak, he explained the whole issue in full detail and also went on to explain the cure for it very clearly. He reduced my anxiety by educating me on the same. I am midway with the treatment as of now, and am expecting positive results at the end of the treatement, with his support.

review: The best dental care I have ever experienced!!! He was gentle and kind to me and explained very well what was going on.Doctor was friendly, respectful, caring. I would highly recommend to anyone.

review: I was having severe toothache and went to the clinic for first time. I really liked how the doctor took time to clear the diagnosis before going for the root canal, he took care of my gum swelling also, he took time to explain what actually is happening and how I should maintain oral hygiene. My swelling and toothache is reducing now, I'm on medications as prescribed by the doctor. I would definitely recommend this clinic! Thanks doc!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I would definitely recommend Dr. Deepak for dental problems as he explains the procedure very well and makes you feel comfortable. The whole team follows cleanliness upto mark and are very organized . I personally visited for root canal treatment for the first time and was very anxious but Doctor Deepak made it very easy and made my fear vanish. Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Dr. Deepak examined and explained the issue pretty well. He then told me that I firstly need to get scaling done. He said their cleaning specialist will do that and then explain the right brushing technique. She did do the cleaning but as if she was in a hurry and did not explain anything in the end. I asked her about what are the next steps and she was like it was upto me.
I have met Dr. Deepak before and he is really good but cant say the same about the cleaning specialist.
All in all the cleaning was done well and Dr Deepak did explain it well but just that they were lacking on some aspects. I also found it slightly overpriced compared to other places I have been to.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: ******* **** ******** **** ******* ****** ***** ********* ********* * **** *** **** I took an emergency appointment for 8 pm because I was in severe pain and my regular doctor was unavailable. We arrived early but doctor saw me at 7.30. Suggested I quickly get an x-ray at nearby center and he will wait for me. We rushed, got that done and had the report mailed to him. Called doctor at 8.05 but he was already leaving. Prescribed some medicines ***** ****** ****** *** asked me to come next day.Why was appointment given for 8 pm if doctor had personal plans? *  ***** **** **** ** *** ***** ****** *** *** **** ****** *** **** *** *** ****** ******

Dr Deepak examined and explained my teeth situation very clearly. There was no unnecessary use of jargons. The costs were told in advance for me to take the decision. After the scaling, he again patiently walked me through possible next steps.
Prices are high comparatively others should makes lesser prices so that all can come n visit the clinic
Excellent experience with Dr Deepak.  Diagnosed the problem accurately, recommended the most economical solution and got it done efficiently. I recommend him highly
